idea:
Nutranovel was established in the year 2018, The organization was setup as a response to solve agricultural issues with innovative , cost effective solutions. The primary focus of the organization has always been B2B solutions with ensuring a positive ROI for the pen-ultimate customer. Major target markets involve, EU, MEA and Latin America.


 


Our vision


Nutranovel additives Ltd is the most successful Agri-innovation company.

To Provide economical eco-sustainable ( E2 ) growth.

The solution provider in the agricultural segment.

All our products are either completely natural or phytopharmaceuticals of natural origin. They are either mixed in animal feed or water. We also undertake customize formulations as per need basis for the customers.


We work and collaborate together as a active manufacturing cell with different mass manufacturing units based in EU and INDIA.


 


Our mission is


To focus on innovative applications in the in Agri-industry

To provide ROI for each customer

To utilize quality driven and scientifically proven repeatable efficacy.

idea: Our Project revolves around Affordable housing solutions for LIG and EWS groups using innovative construction materials like GFRG panels, Mesh, Lime as well as Earthen Bricks which is verified and recognised by Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs MoHUA.
name: Pravesh

idea:
Striving to bring Sunshine to Consumers & Farmers lives by providing Organic-Chemical Free, Fresh & Hygienically Packed-Delivered Farm Produce directly to Consumers (avoiding middlemen),- thereby making the current & future generations strong, healthy & abundant & to Empower the big & small-marginal farmers to earn better returns for their produce.

To leave a sustainable world for future generations.
name: SACVIR ORGANIC LLP

idea:
We are manufacturers of all types of paper bags, grocery bags, shopping bags used across various businesses. 

We also customize (print) as per client requirements. Our bags can be used in Food Chains, Restaurants, Pharmacy, Hospitals, Supermarkets, Grocery stores etc..
